title: Typical mmarpg 2 faction rinse repeat
body:
<Insert 2 factions here>
Make them hate each other
Be bored
<Insert new faction here so the 2 old faction can join forces and fight against it>
Call your mma story's unique.
VIOLA! You've just rinsed and repeated the same bullshit every mmarpg has that are about 2 different faction.

Like seriously, Who the f{{champion:17}} ck said I wanted to join forces with the people I wanted to wipe the floor with? That's like riot making Noxus and Demacia join forces to fight the shadow isles. Who the fuck would want to do that?
